com.strato.hidrive.api

Class HiDriveRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strato.hidrive.api.HiDriveRestClient

  • public class HiDriveRestClient
extends Object
    Location of the HiDrive API functions. All methods has two versions: synchronous (ends with "Sync" postfix) and asynchronous.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  HiDriveRestClient.UploadDomainGatewayHandler
      Special domain gateway handler needed for handling file upload requests
